scripts.dev: node scripts/ensure-kash-env.js && concurrently --names "convex,electron,main-window" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green" "pnpm convex:dev" "pnpm --filter @aipaste/electron dev" "pnpm --filter @aipaste/main-window dev"
scripts.build: pnpm build:kash && pnpm --filter @aipaste/main-window build && pnpm --filter @aipaste/electron build
scripts.build:kash: uvx py-app-standalone --source-only --target electron/resources/kash-env --python-version 3.11 --force python-docx docx2txt markdownify
scripts.clean:fresh: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules electron/node_modules apps/*/.next packages/*/dist electron/dist pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install
